item.text: IE 6.0 or other Explorers base on IE kernel

WebFlow is a project of workflow base on web server. It's compose of flow engineflow,designer,flow form and flow monitor. The main data structor is self-defining XML,what is more active and easy,diffrent from WFMC XML Schema.

The Flow Designer Preview runs well at IE 6.0 which in Windows 2000 and XP. The next version will be run in web server.

My MSN is: f15_nsm@hotmail.com. Welcome mail your bug report and advice to me.
